{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TL-WPA8630 |asin=B01A90CH4M |newegg=N82E16833704304 |price=119.99 |fcc_date=11/08/2016 |is_manuf=No |type=Powerline Access Point |fcc_id=TE7WPA8630 |ic_id=8853A-WPA8630 |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_vac=yes |pwr_ac_hz=50-60 |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9563;QCA9563-AL3A, PE65440.K0, 1532, TAIWAN; |cpu2_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu2_model=QCA7500 |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM68C16CWQD-25H |ram2=128 |ram2_brand=Samsung |ram2_model=K4B1G1646G-BCH9 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9563;QCA9563-AL3A, PE65440.K0, 1532, TAIWAN; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9882;QCA9882-BR4A, FNSB512.K4, 1536, TAIWAN; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8035 |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8337;QCA8337-AL3C, PE6F465.K9, 1552, TAIWAN; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=3 |flags=HomePlug AV2, MIMO |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=TP-LINK_XXXX, TP-LINK_XXXX_5G |default_ip=http://tplinkplc.net |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin }} {{TagLine|Powerline AC Wi-Fi}}
{{ProductPage|http://www.tp-link.com/us/products/details/cat-5509_TL-WPA8630-KIT.html}} {{SupportPage|vendor=TP-LINK|model=TL-WPA8630-KIT}} Sold as part of the TP-LINK TL-WPA8630 KIT which includes this TL-WPA8630 and a [[TP-LINK TL-PA8010P]] Web Management: http://tplinkplc.net Datasheet only claims up to 300Mbps for 2.4GHz and the device only has two antennas so wi1 is likely limited to two streams in operation despite 3x3:3 support from the QCA9563.
